DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized controlled trial of testosterone replacement therapy in hypogonadal men age > 60 years. The goal is to assess the safety and efficacy of TRT in men age > 60 years.
DOC.brief_title: Does Testosterone Improve Function in Hypogonadal Older Men
DOC.criteria: age 6080 yrs serum total testosterone < 300 ng/dL serum bioavailable testosterone < 70 ng/dL unable to provide informed consent history of prostate or breast cancer untreated sleep apnea
